{"id":1241951310,"question_id":3,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1714073468,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"5 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1241951310/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"44.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int lengthOfLongestSubstring(String s) {\n        HashMap<Character, Integer> used = new HashMap<>(); // Track characters seen and their last indices\n        int maxLen = 0;\n        int start = 0;\n\n        for (int i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) {\n            char ch = s.charAt(i);\n            // If the character is already in the used map and within the current window\n            if (used.containsKey(ch) && used.get(ch) >= start) {\n                // Shift the start of the window to the position after the last occurrence of the character\n                start = Math.max(start, used.get(ch) + 1);\n            } else {\n                // Update the max_length if the current window is longer\n                maxLen = Math.max(maxLen, i - start + 1);\n            }\n            // Update the last seen index for the current character\n            used.put(ch, i);\n        }\n\n        return maxLen;\n    }\n}\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
